analysis-model-api.excerpt: A library wrapped into a Jenkins plugin to read static analysis reports into a Java object model. Additionally, this library is used by Jenkins' autograding plugin to grade student software projects based on a given set of metrics (unit tests, code and mutation coverage, static analysis warnings).
